title: Letter From the President to United States Steel Corporation Senior Vice President, General Counsel and Secretary Scot Duncan
summary: President Donald J. Trump, holding the "Golden Share" in U.S. Steel, has designated the Under Secretary of Commerce for International Trade, William Kimmitt, to oversee the company's compliance with the National Security Agreement. Additionally, David Shapiro, Chief Counsel of the Department of Commerce's Investment Accelerator, has been appointed as the Class G Director to ensure U.S. Steel continues operating its domestic production facilities, which are deemed critical for American national security. These designations will remain in effect as long as Kimmitt and Shapiro are employed by the U.S. Government.
